summary: A family is relocated by FBI after the twin sisters stop a diamond thief with ketchup. They are blabbermouths so, as last chance, they end up in in Sydney, Australia. 2 mobsters are sent there for them and the hidden diamond.
cast: Mary-Kate Olsen|Ashley Olsen|Jim Meskimen|Tamara Clatterbuck|Robert Miano|Jason Clarke|Richard Carter|Jo Phillips|Harold Hopkins|Ernie Hudson Jr.|Willie Garson|Jade Bronneberg|Ryan Clark|Scott Swalwell|Nina Schultz|Chris Foy|Daniel Wakefield|Peter Callan|Chris Stapley|Katie Fountain|Randall Rapstine|Marguerite MacIntyre|Ali Humiston|Courtney Beall|Prudie Quigley|Kelly Cohen|Berry Dahlin|Andrew McFarlane|Andrew Crabbe|Guy Leslie|J.P. Manoux|Ken Davitian|Douglas Fisher|Julie Araskog|Sebastian Di Modica|Casey McDonald|Garth Holcombe|Michael Barnacoat|Jill McKay|Brett Blewitt|Harry Dakanalis|Mike Hodge|Troy Martin|Adam O'Neal|Ryan Donald Willis
title: Nuestros labios están sellados
